To install and start Ganache, follow these steps:
1. Download the installation package from the provided link.
2. Install the program and open it to view the interface displaying accounts, blocks, transactions, and logs.
3. Click on "Settings" to set the IP and port binding (set to 8545), account quantity, and gas limit. Click "restart" for the settings to take effect.
4. Ganache will now be running a private Ethereum network on your local machine, bound to port 8545.
